explanation: [0-0] The screen is divided into left and right frames. The left frame shows a grinning woman with long black hair, wearing a black top. Behind her are white cabinets and a ceiling. On the left are white icons and the words "TikTok". In the right frame, a red heart is bowing its head on a gray stone slab, with blue railings and black silhouettes in the background.

[0-6] The woman on the left shakes her head with her hands clasped together and looks forward. The heart on the right walks forward as two arrows fly from behind and hit it. The woman's expression immediately turns alarmed. The scene changes to the right frame, where arrows also fly from the sides of the heart. The woman opens her mouth and shakes her head to express refusal. The heart lowers its head and backs away, then suddenly raises its head and looks forward.
